amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow all section 1983 plaintiffs bringing actions for constitutional violations to use the bill's expedited access to Federal courts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 106-525 to ensure uniformity in the litigation of constitutional claims, including those claims involving the uses of property.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 251 (Roll no. 52).
